The speed of the bullet relative to the ground is $v_0$.
The speed of Cart A is $v_1$.
The speed of the bullet relative to Cart B is $v_0 - v_1$.
The time interval between the firing of two consecutive bullets is $\Delta t_0$.
The distance between two adjacent bullets in the air is $s = (v_0 - v_1)\Delta t_0$.
The speed of the bullet relative to the ground is $v_0 + v_2$.
The speed of Cart B is $v_2$.
The speed of the bullet relative to Cart A is $v_0 + v_1$.
The time interval between the firing of two consecutive bullets is $\Delta t_0$.
The distance between two adjacent bullets in the air is $s = (v_0 + v_1)\Delta t_0$.
